A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Critics score 93%. Audience score 56% and will go down some more. I am with the audience for this one. While trying to reinvent Starwars\, Disney made a mess. Going from the Skywalker saga to a nobody is a blunder. As Mark Hamil said\, they should have taken story advice from George Lucas. This new trilogy is worse than the prequels.
